lexUnit.name: seethe.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: be filled with intense but unexpressed anger.

sentence.text: Inwardly he was seething at the slight to his authority , but under the eagle-eyed scrutiny of his superior in the dreaded society , he carefully kept his features blank .
I was still seething at the injustice of Oliver Moreton 's attitude to me .
` Is that so ? " she slammed back , seething at his brash presumption .
Later , Ronni lay and seethed in her bed .
They reached the entrance in mutual silence and , seething in mounting outrage , she was propelled inside .
The violence seethed inside him , like milk bubbling in a saucepan , trying to boil over and escape the unendurable heat .
As she lurched her way to the galley and filled the kettle , anger seethed through her .
She looked up into his face , anger seething through her , and was surprised to see that he was smiling .
Her chin rose as she seethed with anger .
He gripped and released his fists again and again , seething with anger , frustration and despair .
When she was gone , Caroline turned slowly back into the house , seething so much with frustrated anger that she was speechless .
Paige stepped out into the corridor , seething with angry frustration .
Mortified , inwardly seething with fury at this last suggestion , Caroline had endured Roman 's taunting smile as he 'd wryly assured his hostess that nothing would give him greater pleasure …
I seethed with a totally irrational rage .
Yesterday Frank and Dorothy Lewis were still seething following the court case , which arose from an incident at Ilkeston , in Derbyshire .
Rory pushed herself out of her chair , suddenly fuelled by restless energy , and strode to the window , gazing unseeingly over the lawn for a few moments as anger seethed within her .
Sister Cooney seethed silently under her blotched skin .
Dexter had seethed silently for a few weeks and mentioned his anger to a priest during confession .
But I believe he is still seething about being dragged into the debate and left to look the villain of the piece .
She discarded the trouser suit for a set of underwear in palest pink , and Claudia seethed at having the most wonderful moments of her life dismissed in so summary a fashion .
Jalal Shamlou was seething .
